name: Landslide
description:
"Landslide" is a strategy game with 3D background and 2D characters.
Play the role of God of a mountain, and you can observe, destroy or blend in with people's pioneering, city building, battle management and story plot.
After the eternal peace is disturbed, the mountain god must try his best to stop this almost endless excavation. Explore new characters and plots and discover hidden camps and methods.
But killing is not the only way out! "Landslide" has two special characters with their own characteristics. Players can choose to help one of them and usher in different game endings, or they can balance left and right or choose nothing at all and dominate the whole mountain at will.
The additional story editor allows each mountain god to easily write a custom story and trigger it in the game.
